mapper.insert: insert into T_FILE_CHECK_ERROR ( SETTLE_DATE, ZIP_FILE_NAME, ZIP_FILE_TYPE, CARD_TYPE, CHECK_DATE, RESULT_CODE, RESULT_MSG, INPUT_INVEST_NOTES, INPUT_INVEST_AMOUNT, OUTPUT_INVEST_NOTES, OUTPUT_INVEST_AMOUNT, INPUT_ERROR_NOTES, OUTPUT_ERROR_NOTES, CONSUME_AMOUNT, QS_AMOUNT ) values ( #{settleDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zipFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zipFileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{resultCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resultMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputInvestNotes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{inputInvestAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{outputInvestNotes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{outputInvestAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{inputErrorNotes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{outputErrorNotes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{consumeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{QsAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )
